Prime Minister Shinzo Abe in the House of Representatives special committee of 15 days, to force a vote while acknowledging, "It is true that the understanding of the people is not going" on the security bill, the remains vote again the opposition absence at this meeting the next day I forced it. It is unbelievable violence as many of the constitutional scholar and the knowledgeable person point out that the bill is "unconstitutional" and I feel anger from the bottom of my heart

Nevertheless, this forced voting is nothing but the emergence of "weakness", not the "strength" of the Abe administration. Prime Minister Shinzo Abe said, "I would like to grasp explainly and get understanding", despite having spent 116 hours of discussion time since late May, the more people we discuss, the deeper the people question, the opposite and carefully The number of opinions increased.

In other words, Prime Minister Abe has already failed to get "understanding of the public" about this bill. From now on, at the House of Councilors, we should aim at exposing the essence of this bill to bring out the SDF to the use of overseas force easily by deliberating even more thoroughly, to excel in big public opinion and to dispose of this

And, despite this, if the Abe administration forcibly pushed this enactment by force forcibly at the House of Councilors or by applying the 60-day rule, not only constitutional scholars and lawyers opposed to this, but also widely experts, culture There will be a national movement of "unconstitutional litigation" in which people, speechists, etc are named.

Furthermore, in conjunction with the upper house election next year, it is necessary for any political party to vote for a candidate who declares this bill "unconstitutional" and to fully contain the remedial measures of the Abe administration. It is the Abe administration that is being driven down. If we review the new National Stadium as "listen to the public 's voices," this poor law should also be abandoned immediately.

The President of the State of Bahrain issued today a law to combat discrimination and hatred, which criminalizes all forms of contempt for religions, sanctities, and speeches of hatred and atonement
The law also prohibits and criminalizes all forms of discrimination on the basis of religion, creed, sect, sect, origin, race or color and establishes severe penalties
The new law criminalizes any statement or act that calls for stirring up sedition and ostracism or exploiting religion to atone for individuals and groups

The unity of the community and its cohesion and equality among all its members without discrimination is a guarantee for its stability and happiness .. Sedition and controversy and stir hatred is dismantling him from within

The UAE today issued a new law against any form of discrimination on the basis of religion, caste, doctrine, race, color or ethnic origin
The new law criminalizes any acts that stoke religious hatred or insults religion through any form of expression
The New law Guarantees freedom of individuals against religious intolerance and hate crimes and underpins UAE's policy of inclusiveness

The Statute of Racial Equality, which is the basis for actions to combat all forms of racism and racial discrimination, completes today 5 years.
The Statute is the fruit of years of struggles of the black movement and of a governmental commitment assumed with the creation of @Seppir in 2003.
The Law is an achievement for the black movement and for all Brazilians and Brazilians.
Brazil is a generous land and can not cope with intolerance and prejudice. Do not accept prejudice. Report it!
